en.mounted:
VRChat limitless avatar favorites 
 plugin loaded
en.tippy_transmit:
Transfer to native Favorites first order 
Then click in the game to switch now
en.tippy_use:
Switch now! 
 but you need to switch the world to display correctly in the game
en.avatars_full:
You already have 50 favorite avatars in native Favorites.
Please leave some space first.
en.avatars_added: You already have that avatar favorited
en.operation_failed:
Operation failed.
You can try to refresh the page and try again

zh_cn.mounted:
VRChat无限模型收藏夹 
 插件已加载
zh_cn.tippy_transmit:
传送到游戏内收藏夹第一顺位 
 然后在游戏中点击以立刻切换
zh_cn.tippy_use:
马上切换！ 
 但你需要切换世界才能在游戏中正确显示
zh_cn.tippy_collect: 在无限收藏夹内添加/删除
zh_cn.avatars_full:
系统收藏夹已满
请先留出一些空位
zh_cn.operation_failed:
操作失败.
请尝试刷新页面后重试
